long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Smileys Are One Aspect Of Our Lives That We Use To Express Our Emotions In Online Text Communication. We Use Many Online Communication Platforms Such As Instagram, Facebook, Pinterest, Twitter, Etc. In Our Daily Life. While Talking About All These, We Describe Our Emotions Through Smileys, There Are Many Different Types Of Things Like:


MONKEY FACES
CAT FACES
FANTASY FACES
SICK FACES
NEGATIVE FACES
NEUTRAL FACES
POSITIVE FACES

All These Japanese Faces Under The Category Of A Smiley Face. And The Most Popular Of These Is Kaomoji. Whose Use Are The Most And Which Are Also The Most Popular Japanese Emoticons. Kaomoji Is Made Up Of Kao + Moji Meaning Kao = Faces, Moji = Alphabets. These Emoticons Are Text-Based, Created By English, Roman, And Japanese Alphabets And Symbols. We Call Them Japanese Kaomoji Because They Were First Created In Japan. But They Are Used Very Much In The Surrey World Today.

This Is An Example Of Japanese Kaomoji.
